channel.title: Need help with 317, I have TV
channel.description: I need to know how to add a ::mypos command that tells me my current coordinates, how to add teleport commands like ::home and ::pk, and I need to know how to place npcs like bankers. I have teamviewer, also.

item.title: Need help with 317, I have TV
item.dc:creator: @farme farme
item.description:
@farme wrote:

Most likely u are using delta so search in ur client.java “pickup” and there u should have all ur commands,

if(command.startsWith(“mypos”) && playerRights > 0){
sM(“AbsX: “+absX+” AbsY: “+absY+””);
}

for my pos etc

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with 317, I have TV
